description: Grafana home page of the transcode.eth dashboards.

options.content:
## Transcode.ninja **Transcode.eth**, also known as **Transcode.ninja**, moves with ninja-like agility‚Äîswift, agile, and precise in every transcoding task. Fueled by a 4 Gbps high-uptime internet connection strategically positioned near Frankfurt and London nodes, our services ensure high performance, low latency, full transparency, and unwavering reliability. ü•∑ Our dedication to environmental responsibility is as unwavering as our precision; we proudly operate on green energy. üåø ### Key Features - **Low Latency:** Real-time transcoding for broadcasters and viewers. - **High Performance:** Scalable to three NVIDIA 1070 cards or higher, ensuring consistent excellence. - **Transparency:** Operations, tools, and metrics proudly shared on [Transcode.ninja](https://transcode.ninja). - **High Uptimes:** Ensuring stability with robust internet and strategic positioning. ### Value Proposition #### For Delegators: - **Transparent Operations:** Track performance, expenses and income via public dashboards for trust and transparency. - **Stable Returns:** High-performance transcoding, strategic location, and high uptimes contribute to reliable returns. #### For Broadcasters: - **Low Latency:** Real-time transcoding for a smooth streaming experience. - **High-Quality Output:** Consistently delivers superior transcoded videos. - **Reliability:** High uptimes and strategic positioning provide a reliable transcoding solution. - **Green-Powered Precision**: Your streams are delivered with eco-friendly precision. üåøü•∑ ### Get Involved Unlock the full potential of **Transcode.eth** by: - üíô   Selecting us as your [preferred transcoder](https://explorer.livepeer.org/accounts/0x5bdeedca9c6346b0ce6b17ffa8227a4dace37039/orchestrating) by using the [go-livepeer](https://docs.livepeer.org/references/go-livepeer/cli-reference#options)`-orchAddr` CLI flag. - [Delegate Now: Delegate to Transcode.eth](https://explorer.livepeer.org/accounts/0x5bdeedca9c6346b0ce6b17ffa8227a4dace37039/orchestrating) ### Contact Us Contact us for inquiries, feedback, or collaboration opportunities:
Thanks for choosing **Transcode.eth**‚Äîwhere speed, agility, and strategic connectivity combine to enhance your video transcoding experience on Livepeer!

In our pursuit of transparency, we openly share orchestrator insights through public dashboards hosted on [GitHub](https://github.com/transcodeninja/livepeer-setup/tree/main/monitoring/grafana/dashboards). If you have suggestions or specific data you'd like to see, please share your ideas [here](https://github.com/transcodeninja/livepeer-setup/issues/new?assignees=&labels=enhancement&projects=&template=feature_request.yml). #### Dashboards Overview: 1. Orchestrator Overview: Explore performance scores, active sessions, rewards, and more. 2. Orchestrator Payments Overview: Delve into payment insights, including total ETH distribution, orchestrator payouts, and associated energy costs. 3. GPU Usage Overview: Monitor GPU load, temperature, and performance, gaining insights into graphical processing capabilities.

At transcode.eth, an open-source ethos is central to our philosophy. We share tools for transparency and collaboration, including:

- **[livepeer-exporter](https://github.com/transcodeninja/livepeer-exporter):** A lightweight Prometheus exporter for Livepeer orchestrator metrics, seamlessly integrating with diverse Livepeer endpoints. Explore its capabilities on our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/transcodeninja/livepeer-exporter) and join us in fostering an open and collaborative ecosystem.

Additionally, we actively contribute to other Livepeer repositories, enriching the community and strengthening our commitment to advancing decentralized video processing. üåê‚ú®

#### In Progress

- ‚è≥ **Conduct Rigorous Performance and Income Tests**
  - Conduct extensive performance and income tests on the network with the new setup to ensure optimal functionality.
- ‚è≥ **Contribute to [livepeer/go-livepeer](https://github.com/livepeer/go-livepeer)**
  - Add reward call error metric to [go-livepeer](https://github.com/livepeer/go-livepeer/) (i.e., [Pull Request #2905](https://github.com/livepeer/go-livepeer/pull/2905)).
  - Add reward call retry logic to [go-livepeer](https://github.com/livepeer/go-livepeer/issues/2118).
  - Include additional ticket metrics in [go-livepeer](https://github.com/livepeer/go-livepeer/) (i.e., [Issue #2619](https://github.com/livepeer/go-livepeer/issues/2619)).
- ‚è≥ **Contribute to [livepeer/explorer](https://github.com/livepeer/explorer)**
  - Fix [Delegated stake NaN display bug](https://github.com/livepeer/explorer/issues/236) (i.e. [Pull request #237](https://github.com/livepeer/explorer/pull/237).
  - Add broadcaster widget.
- ‚è≥ **Contribute to [livepeer/subgraph](https://github.com/livepeer/subgraph)**
  - Add pending stake field (see [livepeer-explorer#61](https://github.com/transcodeninja/livepeer-exporter/issues/61)).
  - Fix gasUsed field (see [livepeer-explorer#71](https://github.com/transcodeninja/livepeer-exporter/issues/71)).

#### Planned

- üöß **Brand Creation, Website Development, and Community Engagement**
  - Establishing a distinct branding identity for Transcode.eth.
  - Setup on-chain Livepeer exporter profile.
  - Developing a website to showcase services and features.
  - Setting up official social media accounts for Transcode.eth to actively engage with the community.
- üöß **Additional Delegator Reward Mechanism**
  - Explore and plan to implement additional reward mechanisms for delegators, such as NFTs or voting tokens.
üöß **Create a video dApp**
  - Exploring a cool idea we have for a small dApp that leverages LivePeer as the video streaming backend.
- üöß **Evaluate Demand for Private Pool and Multi-Orchestrator Setup**
  - Assessing the demand for a private pool and considering transitioning to a multi-orchestrator setup if necessary.

#### Completed

- ‚úÖ **Setup Orchestrator and Conduct Initial Performance Tests**
  - Successfully set up the orchestrator and conducted preliminary performance tests on the Livepeer network to ensure a robust foundation.
- ‚úÖ **Create Grafana Dashboards**
  - Implemented detailed Grafana dashboards to achieve full operational transparency, providing detailed insights into orchestrator performance.
- ‚úÖ **Develop Livepeer Prometheus Exporter**
  - Created a [Livepeer Prometheus exporter](https://github.com/transcodeninja/livepeer-exporter) and shared it with the community to enhance the performance of orchestrator dashboards.
- ‚úÖ **Contribute to go-livepeer**
  - Improved `pricePerBroadcaster` config file parsing (i.e., [Pull Request  #2914](https://github.com/livepeer/go-livepeer/pull/2914)).

title: Home
